document_data.caption: Map showing the location of Adarbrent Villa (N39)
document_data.name: Adarbrent Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Adarbrent Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Adarbrent]].
document_data.Location: The Adarbrent Villa was located on the corner of the [[Manycats Alley]] and [[Shield Street]], in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Structure: This building complex consisted of two high quality buildings, one that was four stories tall and another that stood three stories tall.Evidence of this information can be seen in how the villa is depicted on maps.
